      • getIntegrityData

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getIntegrityData(@Context
                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                         java.lang.String auth_token_enc,
                                         java.lang.String requestId)
        Checks if the generation of Integrity Data is done. If FINISHED, returns a zip with the data if PROCESSING, returns HttpStatus.SC_PROCESSING if ERROR, returns HttpStatus.SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR, including the error message Usage: /getdata

      • fixConflicts

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response fixConflicts(@Context
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     java.lang.String params)
                                       throws JSONException
        Method that will fix the conflicts between local and remote. If param 'whereToFix' == local, the fix will take place in local node If param 'whereToFix' == remote, the fix will take place in remote node
        Parameters:
        request -
        params -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        JSONException
